## About Sofía Navarro

<div id="professorInfo">Loading...</div>

<script>
const professorId = "sofia-navarro";

Promise.all([
  fetch("../data/professors.json").then(res => res.json()),
  fetch("../data/centers.json").then(res => res.json())
])
.then(([professors, centers]) => {
  const prof = professors.find(p => p.id === professorId);
  if (!prof) {
    document.getElementById("professorInfo").innerHTML = "<p>Professor not found.</p>";
    return;
  }

  const centerData = (prof.center_ids || []).map(cid =>
    centers.find(c => c.id === cid)
  ).filter(c => c);

  document.getElementById("professorInfo").innerHTML = `
    <p>${prof.bio || "No biography available."}</p>

    <h3>Languages Spoken</h3>
    <ul>${(prof.languages || []).map(l => `<li>${l}</li>`).join("")}</ul>

    <h3>Teaches At</h3>
    <ul>
      ${centerData.map(c => 
        `<li><a href="../centers/${c.page.split("/").pop()}">${c.name}</a> (${c.city})</li>`
      ).join("")}
    </ul>
  `;
})
.catch(err => {
  console.error(err);
  document.getElementById("professorInfo").innerHTML = "<p>Error loading data.</p>";
});
</script>
